name: Cheese Louise!
description:
Louise is on a mission to discover the fabled cheese planet. After many years of travel, she was astonished to find that the planet exists, but she didn't anticipate getting caught by the cats living on the planet!

Help Louise escape the prison and sawblade-ridden mouse meat processing factory using her trusty grapple hook!

This game was made in a month for the Game Off 2020 game jam with the theme "Moonshot", make jumps thought once to be impossible and escape!

Controls: 

A, D - left, right

Space - jump, double jump

Click - shoot grappling hook

Credits:

Programming: Saif Amer

Art: Elaine (@poddlesli)

Level Design & SFX:  Anthony Wells

Music: Sascha Muhr

Source:

https://github.com/mightyminebuster/Github-GameOff-2020
